channel.title: Introduction :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: The first web servers were developed to fulfill a simple role - they responded to requests for HTML documents that were (hopefully) located in their physical storage by streaming the contents of those documents to the client. This is embodied in our request-response pattern. The client requests a resource (such as a HTML document), and receives either a status 200 response (containing the document), or an error status code explaining why it couldnâ€™t be retrieved.
